fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
you may privately select 13 players to
- grant the ability to auto process. (80%)
- learn a random alive players' role (19%)
- instakill one opposing player, aside from yourself (1%)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: At the beginning of the game, the host will post a picture of a D20 that has rolled 13 to mark your arrival.

desc:
Post 4780
*"the rule i learned is that if you roll a 13 on a d20 then you become god for 1 turn and can't die or use spells" -Duwii*
